dialogue.line: Cosmopolis, Center of the Universe
Gravobot!!! I'm so glad you're back safe!!!!

It's a shame about the flowers, though.
I'm sorry we couldn't bring them back in the end.

I'm also sorry that you had to
leave your gravity ball behind.

You all try so hard, even for my silly requests.
I'm so glad I have such wonderful children.
Um... Hello... May I intrude here...
AH!!! BABE!!!!! GRAVOBOT IS BACK!!!!!!!!!

Ah, so they are...
How are you doing, my child...?

That's good... Um... Hm...
I'm not good with words, but...

My wife told me about the planet...
and how it broke...

She also told me...
That you fixed it... all on your own...

You have done a great thing, Gravobot.
We will cherish this planet as long as it lives.

I, uh, was also told that...
this planet was a gift for me....

So if you would allow me to be selfish...
I would like to see it...

I would like to take my lovely wife...
and all of my lovely children...
On a trip to this lovely planet.

And so the SPACE QUEEN, the SPACE EMPRESS, GRAVOBOT 
         and THEIR FAMILY went on a trip,
and on that trip, they picked many flowers.
- FIN -
